title: Retrieve a Business Income Source Summary Response
description: Retrieve a Business Income Source Summary Response

income.description: The total income for the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

expenses.description: The total expenses for the income source. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
